pr_title: [Test] Adjust the setting of GC specific tests on RISC-V

timeline.bodyText: I believe you can just replace "60" to "200" regardless of platform. This extends valid range for parameter only.
timeline.author: dmitripivkine

replies.bodyText: It makes more sense to me this way in terms of RISC-V.  Will update as long as it works for other platforms,  in which case the timeout setting on platforms might be adjusted accordingly.
replies.author: ChengJin01

timeline.bodyText: From test correctness point of view we can replace "5" to "200" regardless of platform. The only issue with this it might increase hang detection time from 10 to 400 seconds. @llxia is it acceptable?
timeline.author: dmitripivkine

timeline.message:
[Test] Adjust the setting of GC specific tests on RISC-V

The test change is to update the initial memory setting &
the threshold values in GC specific tests to ensure the
JVM works appropriately as expected in tests due to the
lack of JIT on RISC-V.

Signed-off-by: Cheng Jin <jincheng@ca.ibm.com>
